name: Two Worlds II: Pirates of the Flying Fortress
name_original: Two Worlds II: Pirates of the Flying Fortress
description:
Two Worlds II: Pirates of the Flying Fortress is an action-RPG game developed by Reality Pump. It came out on 20-09-2011. TopWare Interactive published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Two Worlds II: Pirates of the Flying Fortress has a score of 78. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Two Worlds II: Pirates of the Flying Fortress on PlayStation 3 and PC.
